procurement_category: Specialized trade construction and maintenance services
short_summary: The Work comprises the provision of, as and when requested, all labour, materials, tools, equipment, travel, expertise, administration and supervision, demolition and transportation of goods to perform carpentry work as specified in the Statement of work for the Department of National Defence (DND) 17 Wing Detachment Dundurn, in Dundurn Saskatchewan.\nThis includes the purchase of goods and materials, and the hiring of sub trades to perform specific duties. Detailed information on the work to be completed will be explained and listed in the document \" Scope of Work \" sent by the Project Authority when requesting an estimate.

full_summary:
### Notice for General Contractor RISO: W690D-230241_B

#### Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4110379609-Doc4294703503
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4110379609
* **Publication Date**: November 6, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 6, 2023, at 14:00 EDT
* **Amendment Date**: November 6, 2023
* **Contract Period**: Anticipated to be for a period of 3 years with one 1-year option period
* **Contract Place**: Dundurn, Saskatchewan, Canada
* **Procurement Category**: CNST

#### Notice Type and Method

* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Contract Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites submissions for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for carpentry services at 17 Wing Detachment Dundurn, located on Highway 11, between Saskatoon and Hanley, Saskatchewan. The contract calls for the provision of labour, materials, tools, equipment, travel, expertise, administration, and supervision for carpentry work, as well as the purchase of goods and materials and the hiring of sub trades to perform specific duties.

All bidders must submit their offers by December 6, 2023, at 14:00 EDT. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Victoria Lee
* **Email**: [victoria.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:victoria.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Document Reference**: Consult the attached documents for detailed information on the scope of work and submission requirements.

### Region of Opportunity

* **Dundurn, Saskatchewan, Canada**


### How to Respond

To obtain the documents relating to this contract opportunity, access [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17930052?extsite=MTc5MzAwNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

Please ensure your submissions are made in compliance with the requirements outlined in the solicitation document. Failure to do so may result in your bid
